SELECT T2.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM, T1.* FROM( SELECT r.RESOURCE_KEY, r.RESOURCE_ID, r.RESOURCE_TYPE, r.RESOURCE_DATE, r.RESOURCE_ALIAS, r.RESOURCE_MEMO, r.RESOURCE_USER, COUNT(m.IN_ID) AS mappingDeploy FROM INDIGO_CMM_RESOURCE r, INDIGO_CMM_RESOURCE_MAPPING m, esb_INSTANCE i WHERE r.RESOURCE_KEY = m.RESOURCE_KEY(+) AND m.IN_ID = i.IN_ID(+)
( r.RESOURCE_TYPE like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%' or r.RESOURCE_ID like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%' or r.RESOURCE_ALIAS like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%'
)
r.RESOURCE_TYPE = #RESOURCE_TYPE#
r.RESOURCE_KEY = #RESOURCE_KEY#
GROUP BY r.RESOURCE_KEY, r.RESOURCE_ID, r.RESOURCE_KEY, r.RESOURCE_TYPE, r.RESOURCE_DATE, r.RESOURCE_ALIAS, r.RESOURCE_MEMO, r.RESOURCE_USER ORDER BY R.RESOURCE_DATE DESC )T1 )T2
WHERE ROW_NUM > #SKIP_INDEX# AND ROW_NUM <= #MAX_ROW#

SELECT COUNT(RESOURCE_KEY) FROM INDIGO_CMM_RESOURCE
( RESOURCE_TYPE like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%' or RESOURCE_ID like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%' or RESOURCE_ALIAS like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%' or RESOURCE_MEMO like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%' or RESOURCE_KEY IN (SELECT RESOURCE_KEY FROM INDIGO_CMM_RESOURCE_PROPERTY WHERE RESOURCE_PROPERTY_VALUE like '%' || #SEARCH_INPUT# || '%') )
RESOURCE_TYPE = #RESOURCE_TYPE#
RESOURCE_KEY = #RESOURCE_KEY#

SELECT RESOURCE_PROPERTY_NAME, RESOURCE_PROPERTY_VALUE FROM INDIGO_CMM_RESOURCE_PROPERTY
RESOURCE_KEY = #RESOURCE_KEY#

R.RESOURCE_TYPE = #RESOURCE_TYPE#
M.IN_ID = #IN_ID#

RESOURCE_KEY = #RESOURCE_KEY#
